Original: To survive in the labyrinth, you need
to know your limitations.
[Page]
If you have any questions for me,
don't hesitate to ask. I'm usually
here, too.
Translation: To survive in the labyrinth, you need
to know your limitations.
[Page]
If you have any questions for me,
don't hesitate to ask. I'm usually
here, too.

Original: Oh, what do you want to know?
Translation: Oh, what do you want to know?

Original: [Color:5]What will you ask her?[Color:0]
About battle
About equipment
About skills
Nothing
Translation: [Color:5]What will you ask her?[Color:0]
About battle
About equipment
About skills
Nothing

Original: [Color:5]What subject will you discuss?[Color:0]
Party formation
Binds and ailments
The logbook
Nothing
Translation: [Color:5]What subject will you discuss?[Color:0]
Party formation
Binds and ailments
The logbook
Nothing

Original: Listen to this... Swords and hammers
do high damage at melee range, but
aren't good for enemies in back.
[Page]
But with bows and runes, you can do
very good damage at long range. The
same is true for your enemies, though!
[Page]
You can change formation during
your turn to react to the changing
situation in battle, if you need.
Translation: Listen to this... Swords and hammers
do high damage at melee range, but
aren't good for enemies in back.
[Page]
But with bows and runes, you can do
very good damage at long range. The
same is true for your enemies, though!
[Page]
You can change formation during
your turn to react to the changing
situation in battle, if you need.

Original: Did you know enemies get used to
bindings and ailments over time? It's
hard to make the same one stick twice.
[Page]
That's why it's better to have a
variety of bindings and ailments
at your disposal.
Translation: Did you know enemies get used to
bindings and ailments over time? It's
hard to make the same one stick twice.
[Page]
That's why it's better to have a
variety of bindings and ailments
at your disposal.

Original: I know the chaos of battle can leave
you lost, but it's important to stay
calm and consider your situation.
[Page]
You can check your party's beneficial
effects and status ailments or open
the Codex to see enemy weaknesses...
[Page]
[Color:3]During battle, press the Y Button at
the battle commands to see the party's
beneficial effects and ailments.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]By pressing the L Button, your party
will fight automatically. Press the R
Button to open the Monstrous Codex.[Color:0]
Translation: I know the chaos of battle can leave
you lost, but it's important to stay
calm and consider your situation.
[Page]
You can check your party's beneficial
effects and status ailments or open
the Codex to see enemy weaknesses...
[Page]
[Color:3]During battle, press the Y Button at
the battle commands to see the party's
beneficial effects and ailments.[Color:0]
[Page]
[Color:3]By pressing the L Button, your party
will fight automatically. Press the R
Button to open the Monstrous Codex.[Color:0]

Original: [Color:5]What subject will you discuss?[Color:0]
Action speed
Special weapon effects
Nothing
Translation: [Color:5]What subject will you discuss?[Color:0]
Action speed
Special weapon effects
Nothing

Original: It seems obvious, but your equipment
has weight. The heavier it is, the
more it can slow you down in battle.
[Page]
Rapiers are faster than swords, but
slower than daggers. That sort of
thing.
[Page]
Shoes aren't considered to be armor,
but if you wear them, your action
speed will improve.
[Page]
You don't have to worry about it at
first, but on the other hand, you
won't regret paying attention to it.
Translation: It seems obvious, but your equipment
has weight. The heavier it is, the
more it can slow you down in battle.
[Page]
Rapiers are faster than swords, but
slower than daggers. That sort of
thing.
[Page]
Shoes aren't considered to be armor,
but if you wear them, your action
speed will improve.
[Page]
You don't have to worry about it at
first, but on the other hand, you
won't regret paying attention to it.

Original: Do all of you have weapons imbued
with some kind of special effects?
[Page]
If you equip a weapon with enhanced
abilities, you'll see the effect on
a regular basis.
[Page]
But stat boosts, ailments, and bind
effects only apply to standard
attacks, so keep that in mind.
Translation: Do all of you have weapons imbued
with some kind of special effects?
[Page]
If you equip a weapon with enhanced
abilities, you'll see the effect on
a regular basis.
[Page]
But stat boosts, ailments, and bind
effects only apply to standard
attacks, so keep that in mind.

Original: [Color:5]What subject will you discuss?[Color:0]
Key stats
Skill activation speed
Skill development
Nothing
Translation: [Color:5]What subject will you discuss?[Color:0]
Key stats
Skill activation speed
Skill development
Nothing

Original: Did you know that skills which use
weapons are physical in nature? Their
power depends on your strength.
[Page]
But skills that don't use weapons,
like a runemaster's runes, are more
dependent on the user's intelligence.
[Page]
There are a few rare exceptions, too,
so don't forget about those.
Translation: Did you know that skills which use
weapons are physical in nature? Their
power depends on your strength.
[Page]
But skills that don't use weapons,
like a runemaster's runes, are more
dependent on the user's intelligence.
[Page]
There are a few rare exceptions, too,
so don't forget about those.

Original: Did you know that the time it takes
to activate a skill can be greatly
slowed down or sped up?
[Page]
The more you develop a skill, the
faster it may activate.
Translation: Did you know that the time it takes
to activate a skill can be greatly
slowed down or sped up?
[Page]
The more you develop a skill, the
faster it may activate.

Original: You did know that to learn a new
skill, you might need to learn
whatever prerequisites it has, right?
[Page]
Some skills just can't be learned by
explorers without enough experience.
So you have to keep up your training.
Translation: You did know that to learn a new
skill, you might need to learn
whatever prerequisites it has, right?
[Page]
Some skills just can't be learned by
explorers without enough experience.
So you have to keep up your training.
